title: Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping my daughter in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping my daughter in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams and visions is one of the Islamic legal sciences governed by a set of rules derived from the Holy Qur’an, the Sunnah of the Prophet, and the authentic hadiths contained therein. A dream about my daughter being kidnapped by Ibn Sirin in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my daughter being kidnapped in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about my daughter being kidnapped, based on the Almighty’s saying in the text of the verses of the Holy Qur’an: (Money and children are adornments of the life of this world) We conclude from this verse how important children are to their parents, rather it is a center Life, the sound of arrogant laughter in the home, so we find that many parents have an obsession, fearing that their children will be exposed to fear and their voices will disappear. Home, especially girls, is reflected in their dreams. Hence the interpretation of a dream about the kidnapping of my daughter in a dream: Interpretation of dreams about the kidnapping of my daughter, first of all, it should be noted that this dream could be a dream and does not carry any kind of correct interpretation. In addition, this dream could also be the result of fear of some events that will happen in the future. Interpretation of a dream about my daughter being kidnapped. If a divorced woman sees her daughter being kidnapped in a dream, this indicates that there is a conflict between her and a close person. Such as seeing an unmarried girl in a dream. A dream in which her daughter is kidnapped and engaged to her. The kidnapping indicates the cancellation of the engagement. This vision could also be the result of the unmarried girl being affected by the emotional emptiness that she is currently in control of. In addition, the interpretation of this vision indicates that his dreams will not be fulfilled and despair is taking over him. Interpretation of the dream of my daughter being kidnapped, if A married woman saw that her daughter was kidnapped, this is evidence that her daughter will marry soon if she is of marriageable age. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of giving birth for married, unmarried, pregnant and divorced women. Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping children and escaping from it. Interpretation of a dream about my daughter being kidnapped. On the other hand, the priest may see or The fortuneteller in his dream dreamed of kidnapping a child, but the child survived this kidnapping, and this thing is one of the strange things in the intervention of the Most Merciful’s care, so he indicates signs and signs to the dreamer, and from here came the following: Interpretation of the dream of kidnapping my daughter: The dream is that she lives after the kidnapping of children, especially single women. , is a sign that she discovers the betrayal of the person with whom she is currently in a love relationship, which prompts her to stay away from him. In addition, seeing the child’s survival from kidnapping is evidence of the dreamer’s success in getting rid of the financial crisis that he suffered from. In addition, this indicates The vision indicates relief from the worries and sorrows that burdened the dreamer in the past. Also, this vision can bring an indication of a change in the dreamer’s life for the better, especially after a difficult period. Likewise, in the event that the seer suffers from the debts accumulated on him, his vision of the sponsor’s survival after his kidnapping Evidence of getting rid of debts by paying them. Among the interpretations provided by scholars regarding the vision of a child remaining in a dream is that it is a sign and indication of relief from the work problems that the dreamer was suffering from. See also

title: Interpretation of seeing an open grave in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing an open grave in a dream: Seeing graves in reality is undesirable for a person in reality, because they symbolize death, and seeing them in a dream leads to many indications and meanings that may bring good news to their owner and vice versa, and their interpretation depends. About the dreamer’s condition and the details of the vision, and here are all the interpretation scholars’ statements about opening a grave in a dream in this article. Seeing an open grave in a dream Seeing an open grave in a dream symbolizes many meanings and connotations, the most important of which are: Interpretation of a dream about an open grave in a person’s dream indicates bad financial conditions. And the distress of life that he suffers from. If the dreamer sees in his dream a series of open graves, then this vision does not bode well and will lead to the occurrence of catastrophic natural hazards that lead to the death of many people. The open burial that appeared in a person’s dream symbolizes that the country in which he lives is full of With tyranny and injustice. If a woman dreams of an open grave, this indicates the arrival of bad news and negative events in her life, leading to a bad psychological state. Seeing an open grave in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many interpretations related to seeing an open grave in a dream, which are: A person in a dream of an open grave symbolizes that he cannot make the right decisions about important matters in his life and rejects irreplaceable golden opportunities. If one sees an open burial in his dream, this is clear evidence that he will turn a new page with his creator, and avoid walking on winding roads. And he stops doing what angers and angers him. If a person sees the open grave in his dream, he will suffer heavy material losses or lose valuable things or a person close to his heart. Seeing the open grave in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq, one of the most famous interpreters, explained the meaning of seeing an open grave in a dream. Which is: If the dreamer is confused and sees an open grave in her dream, this is a sign that she will be exposed to more psychological pressure and will be unable to bear the burdens imposed by their large number. Seeing a grave in a person’s dream indicates the approach of his death. If a person dreams of an open grave with a child inside it, then this The dream is a bad omen and leads to a child getting closer to his family, which leads to the deterioration of his psychological state. Seeing an open grave planted with roses and good-smelling flowers represents the removal of all sorrows that prevented him from peace of mind and happiness. Seeing an open grave in a single woman’s dream Seeing an open grave in a woman’s dream Unmarried has many connotations and symbols, namely: If the dreamer is single and dreams that she is walking on an open grave, then she will meet her future husband and may have the opportunity to travel outside her city in the coming period. Seeing an unrelated girl in her dream of an open grave symbolizes that she is rejecting her fiancé out of fear. From the idea of ​​moving to a new life and taking responsibility on her own. If a girl who has never been married sees herself in the open cemetery, this is a clear indication that she is completely unable to achieve all the requirements she tried to achieve in reality. Seeing a grave

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in detail. Lice are considered hateful insects that pollute hair, affect human health, and can cause poor blood levels. There are many interpretations and connotations of seeing lice in a dream for unmarried women, married women, divorced women, and others, as dream interpreters relied on all One of them, in the interpretation of their dreams, and mainly on the situation in which the fortuneteller was. Interpretation of a dream about lice in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi said: Seeing lice and killing them indicates kindness to children, and catching lice and throwing them while they are alive indicates violation of the Sunnah of the Prophet; Because our Noble Messenger forbade this, and there are other interpretations. Also, to see ants killed in a dream, which: indicates freedom from worry and sadness. It indicates escape from fear. It indicates anxiety and worry. It indicates victory when confronting enemies. In the long term, a person seeing that lice rubs him shows his demand for debts among people and other interpretations as well. It includes: Seeing lice on the head and hair indicates committing sins or an idea that is contrary to Sharia. Seeing lice walking on the head indicates bad thoughts. Seeing lice descending from the head to the body means that lice are present in the neighborhood. Getting rid of lice from the head indicates studying bad thoughts. And abandoning them. Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream on clothes. Ibn Sirin said that seeing lice on clothes indicates an increase in debts. If a person sees that he is picking lice from clothes, this means that the person is exposed to lies and deception, and seeing lice in new clothes means renewal of the state and hope for that. Increase in money and livelihood. When seeing old clothes, fear of excessive debt appears. There are other interpretations of seeing lice on clothes, which are: It indicates money and prestige. Not being thankful for God’s blessings on the dreamer. Seeing lice in new clothes indicates exaggeration and exaggeration. If a woman sees If you dream that you are cleaning clothes from lice, this means moderation in spending. Seeing lice coming out of clothes indicates a loss of power and prestige. Interpretation Seeing lice in a dream There are many other interpretations of dreaming of lice in a dream, which were mentioned by Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin, and dream interpreters, and we present them to you in the form of the following points: Al-Nabulsi: Lice found on the ground in a dream indicates weak people and connection to them. Al-Nabulsi: Seeing a lice walking. If the one who sees this is a hater, then they are his enemies, but they will not harm him, because they are weaker than him. Al-Nabulsi: Seeing a wheat louse indicates torment; Because it is one of the signs of Moses, peace be upon him. Al-Nabulsi: Seeing lice in a dream indicates the duration of his illness. Ibn Sirin: Seeing his food indicates crying while awake. Ibn Al-Ghanim: Lice on a new shirt in a dream means money. Ibn Al-Ghanim: Seeing his bite indicates poor ejaculation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing

title: Interpretation of a dream about numbers or numbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail from 0 to 10

preview.html: Numbers are one of the most important things that can be used to enumerate things, calculate prices, and other different and important topics. The appearance of numbers in a dream has many different meanings. Imam Nabulsi gave different interpretations about a group of numbers and the meanings of their appearance in a dream. For example, the appearance of the number 3 in a dream expresses the dreamer’s joy and feeling of joy, while the number of 100 and its multiples indicate that the dreamer can achieve his goals and aspirations in life, and there are many interpretations of it. Because the numbers do not end, and the focus of interpretation on the first ten numbers, each number separately, and on specific numbers is an important pursuit of the main commentators in the Islamic world. Interpretation of a dream about agriculture in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Watch Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing numbers in a dream. Ibn Sirin narrated After him and his interpretations of the evidence of numbers in a dream, he interpreted each number according to what he extracted from the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah of Muhammad. Among the most important things Ibn Shirin wrote in interpreting the following numbers: The number one indicates the believer’s faith in the unity of God Almighty, the second number indicates the difficulty of challenge and salvation, the number three is considered one of the invalid visions, the fourth number indicates blessing and great living, and the number. Five symbolizes the acquisition and profit of lawful and blessed money. Ibn Sirin interprets the number six as the end of the problems faced by the dreamer. The number seven can mean the appearance of separation and distance. The number eight is one of the unpleasant visions as mentioned in the Qur’an in unwanted places. The number nine It indicates the nearness of achieving the desired, and the number ten indicates the fulfillment of the dream and its fulfillment, God Almighty willing. Ibn Sirin believes that the number 11 indicates love and brotherhood, the number twelve indicates success and fertility, the number 13 can mean stumbling, and the number 14 indicates a breakthrough in care. The number fifteen indicates achieving goals, the number sixteen means that things have been completed successfully, and the number seventeen indicates that the dreamer is going to visit the Kaaba for Hajj, God willing. The number eighteen in a dream also indicates strength and achieving power, and the number nine Ten denotes a life full of stability and family warmth, and the number twenty denotes the achievement of aspirations and goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the appearance of numbers in a dream by Imam NabulsiImam Nabulsi will provide many interpretations about seeing numbers in a dream, and he is considered one of the best known dream interpreters in this era. Among the interpretations of numerology by Imam Nabulsi, we mention the following: Whoever sees the number 3 in a dream will be happy in his life, while the number 2 is a sign that the dreamer will get married soon. If one of the dreamer’s odd numbers appears in his dream, the dream may be an expression of the dreamer achieving many goals. What he wants to achieve in his life. And distraction in his life. The number 10 is one of the numbers that expresses the dreamer’s approach to marriage. When the dreamer sees the number 15 in his dream, this dream was one of the dreams that warned of

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing coconut in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing a coconut in a dream and seeing a coconut in a dream indicates happiness and marital and family stability. Or obtaining it may indicate the desire to acquire strange knowledge, and it may sometimes indicate that fortune-tellers and priests believe in their words, and in some cases it symbolizes gaining money and obtaining abundant sustenance in the halal way. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a coconut in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A fortune-teller seeing a grated coconut In a dream, it can indicate a person’s joys and indicate happy occasions, happy atmospheres, a happy life, and a guide to getting rid of the problems and obstacles that stand before him. Prophet. A dream of seeing a coconut with grated coconut used in preparing chocolate and food may indicate that all desires have been fulfilled. The interpretation of seeing a coconut in a dream while walking is evidence of happiness, psychological comfort, and freedom from the fears, problems, and obstacles that a person faces, especially if it is the color of a walnut. India White is a sign of happiness, okay. The days and good news that came down walking. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a coconut for a married woman. A married woman who dreams of eating a coconut may refer to children and sometimes to the husband himself, and seeing a coconut for a married woman is praiseworthy, especially in the case that the taste of the coconut is good and beautiful. It is permissible to refer to Reconciliation between spouses and removing existing differences between them in the event of litigation. A coconut in a dream is evidence that a married woman will get a lot of money, that her husband will get a promotion at work, and that her husband will get money after estrangement and travel. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a coconut for a single woman. A girl who believes That she eats coconuts in her dream may indicate the possession of money and be a guide to using, testing and shaving coconut fruits on the days that make a person live in his heart. Live a trouble-free life. If a girl sees herself buying coconuts, this may mean that she is marrying a man who is not from her area, and this vision indicates the nearness of marriage and the kindness that the dreamer will gain.Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman seeing coconuts. A pregnant woman sees a coconut in her dream, which means that she will give birth to a child with a handsome hero. Seeing a coconut India is one of the good things that a pregnant woman experiences and shows the baby, and this can be a good thing. Good news and newsThey often show a happy future, good news, and a wonderful life. Interpretation of seeing coconut oil in a dream for a single woman. Seeing coconut oil in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates rejection by newlyweds who propose to her. Seeing coconuts for unmarried women also indicates loss and separation. As for pouring oil, it is evidence of rejection without a convincing reason, and not marrying her until after she is old. Interpretation of a dream about eating grated coconut: Whoever sees himself eating grated nuts indicates wealth and wealth. A man’s dream also indicates that he will obtain money from a woman. If you see a coconut In a dream, it means that you are learning astrology.Interpretation of visions

title: Interpretation of seeing a church in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a church in a dream or dreams by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com, as seeing a church in a dream is a sign of getting rid of the worries and sorrows of the fortuneteller, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision for a single girl And a married woman, and a pregnant woman, and a man, and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing a church in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing a church in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is a sign of the end of a period of sorrows and worries. Seeing in a dream the entrance to a church is an indication of the great position of the fortuneteller among the people and his great position in his work. Seeing a tall church in a dream is a bad vision. Which indicates a large number of sins, transgressions, and corrupt morals. Seeing worship inside a church in a dream indicates that the dreamer has lost the person closest to him. See also: Interpretation of a Christian vision in a dream. Seeing a Muslim entering a church to pray indicates corruption in his morals, such as lying and cheating. title: Interpretation of the dream of eating cucumber in a dream in detail

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFans Interpretation of seeing a dream that you are eating cucumbers in a dream in detail. Cucumbers are a vegetable that has a high nutritional value and provides the body with many vitamins and minerals. It also contains a high percentage of water, which helps in treating constipation and aids digestion, and in this article we will explain all Different interpretations of seeing cucumbers in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of cucumbers in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing cucumbers in a dream as anxiety and sadness. Who do you see in the dream? Eating cucumbers. This dream shows his search for something welcome. Anyone who sees cucumbers in their season in a dream will have a blue color. It benefits the dreamer. Ibn Sirin interpreted the pregnant woman in her dream of cucumbers, because they indicate that the newborn is a woman, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream the possibility of cutting iron, this dream indicates the recovery of the patient. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s dream of seeing a cucumber in a dream. Al-Nabulsi agreed with Ibn Sirin: The dream of seeing cucumbers in The dream indicates worry and sadness, and eating cucumbers at the appointed time is good for the dreamer. Seeing cucumbers in a dream is better for the dreamer and better for those who are looking for them. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen in a dream about cucumbers. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream about the soft green cucumbers that he threw in his squeeze, which indicates good speech. Whoever sees his wife eating cucumbers in a dream, this indicates his wife’s love for him and her inclination towards him, and whoever eats these cucumbers in a dream indicates that he will take from her what he wants. Seeing cucumbers in a dream is a dream for a praiseworthy monarch and indicates goodness and benefits. Interpretation of seeing cucumbers in a dream: seeing cucumbers cut into Small pieces: In a dream, this indicates recovery from an illness and for a trader it means profit and receiving money from his trading. Seeing a cut cucumber in a dream means victory over enemies. A cut cucumber in a dream shows the goodness and benefit he gets in reality. Seeing a yellow cucumber in a dream indicates fatigue. And the effort in life to achieve a certain goal. Seeing pickled cucumbers in a dream means gossip and delusions about the honor and reputation of your home. Interpretation of seeing a cucumber for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees a cucumber in a dream, this dream can be a sign that God will bless her with a baby girl, and the dream can be a sign On the goodness and benefit prevailing for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing cucumbers for a married woman: If a married woman sees her husband holding cucumbers, then this dream indicates some benefit and kindness that exceeds her husband’s side and it may be a sign of the great benefit and strength that comes from her work. Therefore, we present to you all the interpretations It is possible to see cucumbers in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the bottom of the article on the site, and we will provide you with the explanation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of eggs in a dream from Ibn Sirin through the following lines. The true vision is the last thing that comes from the revelation after the seal of prophecy with the goodness of God’s creation and His messengers, Muhammad bin Abdullah, may God bless him and grant him peace. Joseph, peace be upon him, was an interpreter of the symbol of eggs in a dream. Follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever dreams that he is eating cooked eggs, this indicates goodness and blessings. A few eggs are better than many, and breaking eggs can indicate the death of a child or relative. He dreams that his wife is ovulating, so she can give birth to a disabled boy. And whoever sees that he puts me under a hen and then the eggs hatch, a good son will be born to him, God willing. And whoever sees that he eats egg shells, he will die or steal them, and whoever eats eggs with the shells on, he will marry a woman who has Money. Interpretation of eggs in a dream for a single woman: It shows her satisfaction with what God has given her, and if she is seen collecting eggs, this indicates the approaching engagement of her engagement, or it could show marriage after an event. Egg yolk in a dream. As for the yolk of an egg, it indicates a woman, and if it is healthy, it indicates righteousness. The woman, and if it is not like that, then it does not apply to her religion or management. Eating an egg yolk indicates a good fortuneteller, and whoever sees a large egg yolk, which is good, indicates a lot of money. If he sees that the egg yolk coming out of his woman is large, this indicates the food of the male, and if It was small and indicates female food. But if a pregnant woman sees that she is eating the yolk of an egg, this indicates that she will have daughters and that she will give birth soon. Interpretation of a dream about eggs falling and breaking eggs can indicate the need to beware of envy, and the confirmation was said after fear, and anyone who sees eggs Broken in the house of one of his acquaintances could indicate the presence of problems between them. It may indicate, God forbid, the death of a child, or the miscarriage of his fetus, or humiliation and humiliation, and all good or evil comes first from God and then according to the sacred and the circumstances of the vision. To interpret a different dream, you can Visit the instant dream interpretation application.

title: The name Tariq in a dream and seeing a person named Tariq in a dream

preview.html: The name Tariq in a dream symbolizes sudden things that change the course of the viewer’s life for better or for worse depending on the context of the vision. Seeing a person named Tariq in a dream means meeting loved ones after travel or disagreements. And new responsibilities to gain goodness, and God knows best. The meaning of the name Tariq in a dream. The name Tariq in a dream is one of the names that indicate surprises and good news in general. The name Tariq can indicate positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a person named Tariq in a dream means safety from enemies and haters, and it may mean obtaining... Help from him at work if he is known. Dreaming about an unknown person named Tariq indicates psychological attainment and stability in life after the dreamer’s suffering. Hearing the name Tariq in a dream is evidence that you are hearing good things that alleviate the anxiety and fear that the dreamer suffers from. Interpretation of names in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the name Tariq in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the name Tariq in a dream as a visitor to his loved ones. It can indicate the arrival of good or bad news depending on the context of the vision, and dreaming of the name Tariq means sustenance and money from which the fortuneteller does not count if it is one of the fortuneteller’s favorite names, and seeing The name Tariq in a dream indicates an attempt to get rid of sudden events and sorrows, and the name Tariq was said in a dream about a sick person who is not good for him, as it may indicate the approaching death of him. Pronouncing the name Tariq in a dream indicates sudden news for someone. A dream about pronouncing the name Tariq may indicate that we are telling the truth that Others do not like it. Writing Tariq’s name in a dream means satisfying needs and achieving goals. If the writing is in good handwriting, and whoever sees that he is writing Tariq’s name in a dream in bad handwriting, then he is in a hurry to complete his work, and seeing Tariq’s name written in a dream means stability in difficult and turbulent situations. . Dreaming about changing one’s name to Tariq indicates changing one’s profession or job, and whoever dreams of someone calling him by the name Tariq will receive a promotion or award for completing his work perfectly. Interpretation of hearing the name Tariq in a dream Dreaming of hearing the name Tariq indicates that you will hear news that will change the course of the dreamer’s life. Hearing the name Tariq loudly in a dream means that you are being warned and accused of wrongdoing, and seeing the name Tariq in a low voice in a dream means security and peace of mind. Seeing a person named Tariq speaking in a dream means listening to advice and wisdom, and whoever sees a well-known person named Tariq screaming in a dream. This is evidence of his need for advice and guidance, and he dreamed of hearing someone’s name. Tariq’s crying indicates his relief after his worries and sorrows, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a person named Tariq in a dream. Seeing a person named Tariq in a dream means meeting a family member after a long absence. A dream about a person named Tariq can indicate positive changes that will enter the dreamer’s life. Dreaming of sitting with someone you know His name, Tariq, indicates making covenants and agreements with him, and whoever sees that he is talking with a person named Tariq in a dream, this is evidence of facilitating matters and joint work. A quarrel with a person named Tariq in a dream indicates excessive exhaustion in the life of the fortuneteller, and a dream of hitting a familiar person.

title: Interpretation of a dream of a single woman having a male and female child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a single woman having a male and female child in a dream. This is the topic of our article today, which deals with the interpretation of dreams in many cases. The interpretation varies according to the viewer, whether she is a man, divorced, pregnant, and the like. The dream occupies our thinking and our mind. Do not rest until we discover the meaning of this dream and its interpretation. . At the end of our article, we will explain it to you. Interpretation, follow us.You may be interested: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a single woman having a male and female child in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a single woman having a male and female child in a dreamIbn Sirin mentioned in a dream for an unmarried woman that seeing a child, male or female, is an indication of a relationship New. As a wedding or engagement near someone. While the dream was that she was carrying a male child, this is a sign of a strong love relationship with a young man. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned that if an unmarried woman sees herself carrying a female child, this is good news of joy and pleasure. Also, when the child screams in In a dream, this could indicate problems and fears in the life of a single woman. And a male child in one dream, if it is beautiful, is evidence of the disobedience that this girl will pursue. Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an infant by Al-Nabulsi. He found Sheikh Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of an unmarried woman’s dream of giving birth to a child, Another aspect, which is as follows: Al-Nabulsi praised that a child in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of her delayed marriage. While the child is beautiful, this is a sign of marriage to a good person. And if many children meet her in a dream, this is a sign of desires that will be fulfilled, God willing. He also said that if an unmarried girl gives birth to a strange child, this may be an unpleasant problem. And if she cries and holds him until he is silent, this vision shows the tenderness of her heart and her beautiful features. If an unmarried woman dreams of caressing a child, this is a reflection of her desire for motherhood. It could be An indication of the imminence of marriage or a relationship. Al-Nabulsi explained that a single girl’s smile at young children is a sign that someone is making advances towards her. The water cycle in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a pregnant woman who has a male or female child. It has been said that a pregnant woman’s dream is to give birth to a child, because it is a sign of goodness and nourishment. As It indicates that a beautiful female is healthy, and God knows best. A male child indicates some health problems that a pregnant woman may face. A beautiful child is a sign of goodness and happiness in the future, God willing. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of having a male or female. An infant separated from a married woman is evidence of her love. And her concern for her husband and children. If a married woman dreams that she is looking at a small child, this may be a sign of pregnancy. While the wife sees that her husband is carrying a small child, this is evidence of sustenance and profit. What is the interpretation of a man who sees a small child in a dream? The interpretation varies. The dream for a man about a woman when he sees a small child, we explain it to you as follows: A man seeing a male child constantly crying and not knowing how to comfort him is a sign that he is on the wrong path in matters of his work and life.
